article_title: Your Views: For Republican Party, chickens have come home to roost
article_text:
For decades, the GOP has courted the extreme fringe wing-nut voters. Election after election, the GOP made promises to these...

article_metadata.Description: By consistently ignoring fringe voters’ needs, the GOP suddenly finds itself staring into a Goldwater type of election chasm.
